text: Hello
Hello how's it going?
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
Sounds like a charity I would like to donate to
The organization is very professional and will use your money wisely.
I would be happy to donate 2 dollars to this organization.
Well the bonus for this task is $1.70, you can donate all or a part of your bonus to this great cause.
I would like to donate the full amount of my bonus.
That is so generous of you! Have you heard of this charity before?
Yes I have. I really have a heart for children in need.
That is very kind of you. Do you have children of your own?
I do. I have three boys. They are my world.
I have two kids too. I think that's why it's important to help other less fortunate.
I have been in their situation before so I agree that if you have an opportunity to he
Very true. This charity seems like it really cares about the welfare of children.
The children are our future. We should always look out for them.
I agree. I hope this will make a difference.
Thank you for giving me this opportunity to support a great cause.
thank you for your contribution
Have a great day!
